data.text:
Curved Girders for Stadiums & Arenas

Since the beginning of its installation of some of the largest section bending equipment in 1992, Chicago Metal Rolled Products has provided thousands of curved girders for stadiums and arenas. With more heavy rolling equipment than anyone else in North America, the company has the capacity, the know-how, and the responsiveness to meet the requirements of the most demanding projects.

Stadium & Arena Images

Stadium & Arena Capacities

Chicago Metal has the greatest experience and greatest capacity for rolling heavy structural steel in the country. The company produces curved beams the world's largest beam bender capable of bending W44 x 290 against the weak or strong axes. It also operates 60 other rolling and bending machines in full service plants in Chicago IL and Kansas City, MO. Even on these large steel sections, the company offers 3-day, 2-day, 1-day and same-day turnaround times to facilitate the on-time delivery of any required curved girders.

Stadium & Arena Value-Added Services

Chicago Metal accommodates the needs of structural fabricators of stadiums and arenas in various ways. The company will store steel in a climate-controlled facility to minimize any damage and to deliver the material when needed. The company will ship the material in the order requested through trucking firms chosen by the customer or by Chicago Metal. Chicago Metal has excellent relationships with special carriers who can transport steel sections as long as 110 ft. It can also arrange to ship by rail or boat.

Stadium & Arena Applications

We have worked closely with Populous (formerly HOK sport event), Walter P. Moore, and other architectural and engineering firms to design and fabricate roof trusses, arches for entryways, and ornamental iron in numerous stadiums and arena. Chicago Metal has supplied significant amounts of curved steel for the stadiums of the Bears, the Steelers, the Pacers, the Brewers, the Pirates, the Dolphins, and the Browns to name a few professional teams.

Contact us for more information on curved beams and girders for stadiums.
